argument.name: ui_beep_style
argument.description: Optional. Determines which system beep is played.

page.discussion: UI_BEEP() plays a system beep sound through your computer's speaker. Sounds are attached to the various types of system beeps through the Windows Control Panel. Limitations: Desktop applications only.

section.title: Example
section.description: This function beeps the specified number of times.
section.example: function beep_a_lot(beep_num as N) for i = 1 to beep_num ui_beep() sleep(1) next i end function

section.description: Prompts the user for a password and beeps if the password is incorrect.
section.example: password = "Alpha5" entered = ui_get_text("Password", "Enter the password", "******", " ") if (entered = "") then end end if if entered == password then ui_msg_box("Password","Accepted.") else ui_beep() ui_msg_box("Password", "Password invalid.") end end if
